page.title: 03Leisure and Recreation.
page.content: Hartwell is particularly badly off for things to occupy the teenagers.There is nothing to do apart from a monthly youth club.There are more things for the younger children.Most teenagers go to Roade where things are more lively. Ashton has similar problems but most of the people there are better off and can take their children to more places.Our village used to have a football and a cricket team as well as a more regular youth club but they closed through lack of support.Most people aren't bothered about our village.They drive elsewhere for water sports or keep fit or else stay at home to watch television,videos or use home computers.It will need a real effort and a lot of money and trust to improve the situation.
